user_id.description: The ID of the User who created Subscription

deal_id.description: The ID of the Deal this Subscription associated with

cycles_count.description: Shows how many payments a Recurring Subscription has

infinite.description: Indicates that the Recurring Subscription will last until it's manually canceled or deleted

start_date.description: The start date of the Recurring Subscription

end_date.description: The end date of the Subscription

lifetime_value.description: The total value of all payments

final_status.description: The final status of the Subscription

add_time.description: The creation time of the Subscription

update_time.description: The update time of the Subscription
